templates.index: <%= l10n.attacks %>

'(' + attack.origin_alliance_name + ')' : '' %> <%= attack.target_town_link %> <% if (attack.target_player_id) { %> (<%= attack.target_player_link %>) <% } %> <% if (attack.target_alliance_id) { %> (<%= attack.target_alliance_name %>) <% } %> <% if (attack.target_is_temple) { %> (<%= l10n.temple + ' ID: ' + attack.target_town_id %>) <% } else if (!attack.target_player_id) { %> (<%= l10n.ghost_town + ' ID: ' + attack.target_town_id %>) <% } %>
    <%= l10n.sent_at %> <%= DateHelper.formatDateTimeNice(attack.send_at, true) %> <%= l10n.arrive_at %> <%= DateHelper.formatDateTimeNice(attack.arrival_at, true) %>
